model

Class Statistics

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Statistics

  • public class Statistics
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the logic which use to create statistic data to present the development of the pattern on the game board in terms of statistical data.

    • Method Detail

      • statistics

        public int[][] statistics(Board board,
                          int iterations)
        A method to calculate number of alive cells(row0), evolution in alive cells(row1) and similarity measure(row2). source: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/11919009/using-javax-sound-sampled- clip-to-play-loop-and-stop-mutiple-sounds-in-a-game
        Parameters:
        board - a current board to be calculated
        iterations - an interval of time/iterations
        Returns:
        2D array contains alive cells, evolution and similarity measure over a particular interval of time/iterations.

      • createStatistics

        public int[][] createStatistics(Board board)
        Draw line chart to illustrate number of alive cells, evolution in alive cells and similarity measure over a particular interval of time/iterations.
        Parameters:
        board - a current board
        Returns:
        statisticsData the array that contains the data about alive cells, evolution in cells and similarity measure.
        See Also:
        statistics(model.BoardPack.Board, int)

      • duplicateNumber

        public void duplicateNumber(int[] similarity)
        Method for finding duplicate numbers in similarity data.
        Parameters:
        similarity - the array that store similarity data.
        See Also:
        indexOfDuplicateNumber(int)

      • indexOfDuplicateNumber

        public void indexOfDuplicateNumber(int duplicateNumbers)
        Method for finding index of the duplicate numbers.
        Parameters:
        duplicateNumbers - the number in the array that repeat more than one time.
        See Also:
        duplicateNumber(int[])

      • copy

        public Board copy(Board board)
           throws java.io.IOException,
                  java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Method for making a deep copy of Board object. Objects are first serialized and then deserialized. source: http://javatechniques.com/blog/faster-deep-copies-of-java-objects/
        Parameters:
        board - a board to be copy
        Returns:
        a copied board
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - - to capture exceptions related to the error loading file and file loading. (https://docs.oracle.com/javase/7/docs/api/java/io/IOException.html)
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - - exception throw if it doesn't found the requested class in class path.
